The Russian Federation Annual and Monthly Inflation Tables
Russia Annual and Monthly Inflation Tables

Month over Month Inflation Table

Month over month inflation rate is calculated from the beginning of the month to its end. It is a common way to represent monthly inflation in many countries as it is the most intuitive.

Year Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec Total 2016 0.96 0.63 0.46 0.44 0.41 0.40 3.34 2015 3.85 2.22 1.21 0.46 0.35 0.19 0.80 0.35 0.57 0.74 0.75 0.77 12.91 2014 0.59 0.70 1.02 0.90 0.90 0.62 0.49 0.24 0.65 0.82 1.28 2.62 11.36 2013 0.97 0.56 0.34 0.51 0.66 0.42 0.82 0.14 0.21 0.57 0.56 0.51 6.45 2012 0.50 0.37 0.58 0.31 0.52 0.89 1.23 0.10 0.55 0.46 0.34 0.54 6.58 2011 2.37 0.78 0.62 0.43 0.48 0.23 -0.01 -0.24 -0.04 0.48 0.42 0.44 6.10 2010 1.64 0.86 0.63 0.29 0.50 0.39 0.36 0.55 0.84 0.50 0.81 1.08 8.78 2009 2.37 1.65 1.31 0.69 0.57 0.60 0.63 0.00 -0.03 0.00 0.29 0.41 8.80 2008 2.31 1.20 1.20 1.42 1.35 0.97 0.51 0.36 0.80 0.91 0.83 0.69 13.28 2007 1.68 1.11 0.59 0.57 0.63 0.95 0.87 0.09 0.79 1.64 1.23 1.13 11.87 2006 2.43 1.66 0.82 0.35 0.48 0.28 0.67 0.19 0.09 0.28 0.63 0.79 9.00 2005 2.62 1.23 1.34 1.12 0.80 0.64 0.46 -0.14 0.25 0.55 0.74 0.82 10.91 2004 1.75 0.99 0.75 0.99 0.74 0.78 0.92 0.42 0.43 1.14 1.11 1.14 11.74 2003 2.40 1.63 1.05 1.02 0.80 0.80 0.71 -0.41 0.34 1.00 0.96 1.10 11.99 2002 3.09 1.16 1.08 1.16 1.69 0.53 0.72 0.09 0.40 1.07 1.61 1.54 15.06 2001 2.80 2.30 1.90 1.80 1.80 1.60 0.50 0.00 0.60 1.10 1.40 1.60 18.82 2000 2.30 1.00 0.60 0.90 1.80 2.60 1.80 1.00 1.30 2.10 1.50 1.60 20.13 1999 8.40 4.10 2.80 3.00 2.20 1.90 2.80 1.20 1.50 1.40 1.20 1.30 36.59 1998 1.50 0.90 0.60 0.40 0.50 0.10 0.20 3.70 38.40 4.50 5.70 11.60 84.47 1997 2.30 1.50 1.40 1.00 0.90 1.10 0.90 -0.10 -0.30 0.20 0.60 1.00 10.99 1996 4.10 2.80 2.80 2.20 1.60 1.20 0.70 -0.20 0.30 1.20 1.90 1.40 21.85 1995 17.80 11.00 8.90 8.50 7.90 6.70 5.40 4.60 4.50 4.70 4.60 3.20 131.61 1994 17.90 10.80 7.40 8.50 6.90 6.00 5.30 4.60 8.00 15.00 14.60 16.40 214.77 1993 25.80 24.70 20.10 18.70 18.10 19.90 22.40 26.00 23.00 19.50 16.40 12.50 840.03 1992 245.30 38.00 29.90 21.70 11.90 19.10 10.60 8.60 11.50 22.90 26.10 25.20 2508.85 1991 6.20 4.80 6.30 63.50 3.00 1.20 0.60 0.50 1.10 3.50 8.90 12.10 160.40

* Red color denotes deflation.

Year over Year Inflation Table

Year over year inflation rate is calculated monthly for the 12 month period that includes 11 months prior to the selected one and the selected month itself. As a result, YOY inflation rate represents the sliding 12 month sum of monthly inflation rates. YOY inflation rate is most commonly used in the United States to represent the inflation.

Year Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec Total 2016 9.77 8.06 7.26 7.24 7.30 7.53 3.34 2015 14.97 16.71 16.93 16.42 15.78 15.29 15.64 15.77 15.68 15.59 14.98 12.91 12.91 2014 6.05 6.20 * Red color denotes deflation.

Notes

Inflation rate is not summed algebraically. To calculate the inflation rate for the custom period, please use the Inflation Calculators.

This data is also presented in a form of month over month, year over year and yearly charts.

To compare the data between different periods and different countries, you can use the Comparison page.

To learn more about the data source and release schedule, please visit the Overview page.
